page.title: 02SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: Hampton is an area of mixed housing styles but it is largely a middle class residential area with very little industry and a large population of adults who travel out of the area to work. There is a local shopping area consisting of small shops with a limited range of goods on offer and there is also a large supermarket which has recently been built on a new estate. However, for everything other than the day to day needs of a family peopleliving in Hampton have to travel to the larger shopping centres of Kingston, Staines, Richmond or Hounslow. We surveyed the shopping habits of 90 families living in Hampton and of these shopping centres Kingston was by far the most popular due to ease of access, good range of shops and plenty of parking spaces.
